5087.verse: يَوْمَ|(On the) Day|107|122|1057$تَرَى|you will see|97|127|5175$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believing men|136|166|1964$وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ|and the believing women,|189|219|7744$يَسْعَىٰ|running,|77|92|13381$نُورُهُم|their light|83|90|16635$بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ|before them|117|131|2273$وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِم|and on their right,|140|154|16636$بُشْرَٮٰكُمُ|`Glad tidings for you|156|170|16637$ٱلْيَوْمَ|this Day -|86|100|2217$جَنَّـٰتٌ|gardens|75|82|2685$تَجْرِى|flowing|81|93|242$مِن|from|50|74|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath it|109|133|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers,|88|112|244$خَـٰلِدِينَ|abiding forever|118|142|1409$فِيهَا‌ۚ|therein.|71|95|253$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|76|28$هُوَ|[it] (is)|68|171|298$ٱلْفَوْزُ|the success|100|306|3793$ٱلْعَظِيمُ|the great.`|95|198|2284$

5088.verse: يَوْمَ|(On the) Day|107|121|1057$يَقُولُ|will say|68|96|77$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ|the hypocrite men|141|169|7309$وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ|and the hypocrite women|189|217|7715$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|122|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believed,|82|98|84$ٱنظُرُونَا|`Wait for us,|106|137|16638$نَقْتَبِسْ|we may acquire|124|155|16639$مِن|of|50|81|53$نُّورِكُمْ|your light.`|95|126|16640$قِيلَ|It will be said,|113|128|97$ٱرْجِعُواْ|`Go back|94|105|9207$وَرَآءَكُمْ|behind you|94|116|8708$فَٱلْتَمِسُواْ|and seek|102|124|16641$نُورًا|light.`|65|87|5814$فَضُرِبَ|Then will be put up|147|169|16642$بَيْنَهُم|between them|115|126|1056$بِسُورٍ|a wall,|75|90|16643$لَّهُۥ|for it|54|84|977$بَابُۢ|a gate|63|92|16644$بَاطِنُهُۥ|its interior,|92|122|16645$فِيهِ|in it|49|78|32$ٱلرَّحْمَةُ|(is) mercy|92|122|16646$وَظَـٰهِرُهُۥ|but its exterior,|123|138|16647$مِن قِبَلِهِ|facing towards [it]|144|346|16648$ٱلْعَذَابُ|the punishment.|127|329|827$

5089.verse: يُنَادُونَهُمْ|They will call them,|148|154|16649$أَلَمْ|`Were not|89|102|348$نَكُن|we|58|71|4565$مَّعَكُمْ‌ۖ|with you?`|92|105|121$قَالُواْ|They will say,|111|124|101$بَلَىٰ|`Yes,|57|70|772$وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ|but you|93|99|13782$فَتَنتُمْ|led to temptation|135|148|16650$أَنفُسَكُمْ|yourselves|90|115|449$وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ|and you awaited|130|155|16651$وَٱرْتَبْتُمْ|and you doubted|132|157|16652$وَغَرَّتْكُمُ|and deceived you|137|150|15671$ٱلْأَمَانِىُّ|the wishful thinking|148|159|16653$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|86|526$جَآءَ|came|57|79|4023$أَمْرُ|(the) Command|122|144|8630$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah.|86|108|606$وَغَرَّكُم|And deceived you|138|149|16654$بِٱللَّهِ|about Allah|94|330|79$ٱلْغَرُورُ|the deceiver.|108|344|13862$

5090.verse: فَٱلْيَوْمَ|So today|80|86|6437$لَا|not|42|55|30$يُؤْخَذُ|will be accepted|128|141|475$مِنكُمْ|from you|78|91|643$فِدْيَةٌ|any ransom|96|109|1588$وَلَا|and not|71|84|25$مِنَ|from|50|63|156$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|96|20$كَفَرُواْ‌ۚ|disbelieved.|97|110|59$مَأْوَٮٰكُمُ|Your abode|95|121|16655$ٱلنَّارُ‌ۖ|(is) the Fire;|104|130|762$هِىَ|it (is)|56|82|665$مَوْلَـٰكُمْ‌ۖ|your protector|116|142|3362$وَبِئْسَ|and wretched is|126|139|1161$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|the destination.|125|125|1162$

5091.verse: ۞ أَلَمْ|Has not|89|104|348$يَأْنِ|come (the) time|127|156|16656$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|141|750$ءَامَنُوٓاْ|believed|82|111|84$أَن|that|48|77|655$تَخْشَعَ|become humble|122|136|16657$قُلُوبُهُمْ|their hearts|97|115|1096$لِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ|at (the) remembrance (of) Allah|232|267|16658$وَمَا|and what|82|117|46$نَزَلَ|has come down|123|158|10576$مِنَ|of|50|68|156$ٱلْحَقِّ|the truth?|87|93|613$وَلَا|And not|72|85|25$يَكُونُواْ|they become|106|119|7469$كَٱلَّذِينَ|like those who|115|128|3147$أُوتُواْ|were given|92|105|940$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|98|451$مِن قَبْلُ|before,|92|98|250$فَطَالَ|(and) was prolonged|156|168|16659$عَلَيْهِمُ|for them|76|101|602$ٱلْأَمَدُ|the term,|82|107|16660$فَقَسَتْ|so hardened|101|126|16661$قُلُوبُهُمْ‌ۖ|their hearts;|103|128|1096$وَكَثِيرٌ|and many|84|96|5130$مِّنْهُمْ|of them|71|273|730$فَـٰسِقُونَ|(are) defiantly disobedient.|200|402|5081$

5092.verse: ٱعْلَمُوٓاْ|Know|85|95|5272$أَنَّ|that|48|68|240$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|73|184$يُحْىِ|gives life|78|98|2306$ٱلْأَرْضَ|(to) the earth|113|133|197$بَعْدَ|after|52|72|1117$مَوْتِهَا‌ۚ|its death.|84|104|1426$قَدْ|Indeed,|70|80|1097$بَيَّنَّا|We have made clear|155|173|1098$لَكُمُ|to you|63|100|196$ٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs|82|119|1099$لَعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|166|193$تَعْقِلُونَ|understand.|99|117|453$

5093.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|88|58$ٱلْمُصَّدِّقِينَ|the men who give charity|189|226|16662$وَٱلْمُصَّدِّقَـٰتِ|and the women who give charity,|242|279|16663$وَأَقْرَضُواْ|and who lend|114|132|16664$ٱللَّهَ|(to) Allah|82|99|184$قَرْضًا|a loan|79|113|2159$حَسَنًا|goodly,|69|103|2160$يُضَـٰعَفُ|it will be multiplied|141|175|8425$لَهُمْ|for them,|81|115|98$وَلَهُمْ|and for them|105|122|71$أَجْرٌ|(is) a reward|105|356|3512$كَرِيمٌ|noble.|68|319|7136$

5087.verse: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.

5088.verse: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.

5089.verse: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.

5090.verse: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.

5091.verse: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.

5092.verse: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.

5093.verse: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.
